data.title: Six Generations of the Ripley Family in Nova Scotia
data.text:
51. Henry Ripley Lowther [Mary3rd, Henry2nd, Robert1st], b ca 1821 d 1872. m Esther Pipes, b 1819 d 1900 at Fenwick, N.S.

Children of Henry and Esther (Pipes) Lowther:

—i. Hannah Abigail Lowther, b 1849 d 1941. m William Donkin, b 1835 d 1923. —ii. Mary Eliza Lowther, b 1851 at Fenwick, N.S. m Frank Black, b ca 1850. —iii. Thomas Parkinson Lowther, b 1853 at Fenwick, N.S. d 1919. m Bertha A. Barnes, b ca 1855 at Maccan, N.S.

52. Mary Ripley [John3rd, Henry2nd, Robert1st], b ca 1820. m Mar 8, 1838, James Read, b ca 1812 d ca 1885.

Children of James Read and Mary (Ripley) Read:

—i. Lavinia Jane Read, b ca 1857 d ca 1911.[1] —ii. Sarah Ann Read, b ca 1839 d ca 1896.[2] —iii. Thomas Read, b ca 1840 d ca 1923.[3] —iv. John William Read, b ca 1843 d ca 1922.[4] —v. Amelia Cove Read, b ca 1845 d ca 1919.[5] —vi. Selina Read, b ca 1850 d ca 1830.[6] —vii. Mary Louisa Read, b ca 1850 d ca 1896.[7] —viii. Athlinda Matilda Read, b ca 1853 d ca 1929.[8] —ix. James Edmund Read b ca 1855 d ca 1818.[9] —x. Emma Theresa Read, b ca 1860 d ca 1940.[10] —xi. Ida Read, b ca 1863 d ca 1863.[11]

53. Jane D. Ripley [John3rd, Henry2nd, Robert1st], b ca 1823. m Jesse D. Montrose, b ca 1820.[12]

Children of Jesse Montrose and Jane (Ripley) Montrose:

—i. Eliza Ann Montrose, b ca ---- d ca ----.[13] —ii. John William Montrose, b ca 1851. m Martha Ellis Woodbury, b ca 1875, of Middleboro, N.S..[14] —iii. Rufus Augustine Montrose, b ca 1853 d 1935.[15]

54. John Francis Ripley [John3rd, Henry2nd, Robert1st], b ca 1826 d 1905. m 1852, Rebecca Ann Spence, b ca 1830.

Children of John F. and Rebecca (Spence) Ripley:

—i. Helen Ripley, b ca 1854.[16] —ii. Arthur Ripley, b ca 1855.[17] —iii. Crane Ripley, b ca 1858.[18] —iv. Ada Ripley, b ca 1861.[19] +110.v. Albert Edward Ripley, b Nov 16, 1863 d Sep 15, 1936.[20] m Amelia Jane Smith, b ca 1865.

55. Eliza Ann Ripley [John3rd, Henry2nd, Robert1st], b ca 1831 d Dec 19, 1921.[21] m (1) Priestley Davis, b ca 1820 d bfr 1860(?). The marriage took place on Nov 11, 1852.[22] m (2) John A. Pride, b ca 1820 d Jun 30, 1876.[23]m (3) James Z. Bliss, b ca 1811 of Amherst, N.S.[24]

Children of Priestley Davis and Eliza (Ripley) Davis:

—i. Amelia Jane Davis, b ca 1852. m Alexander J. Smith, b ca 1850, of Nappan, N.S.[25] —ii. Robert W. Davis, b ca 1856.[26] m Annie Coates, b ca 1861, of Nappan, N.S.[27] Robert was a shoemaker.

Children of John A. Pride and Eliza (Ripley) Pride:

—i. Thomas Priestley Pride, b ca 1861.[28] —ii Edwin C. Pride, b ca 1864 d May 1, 1870 of diptheria.[29] —iii. John Parkinson Pride, b Sep 12, 1866[30] d ca ----. —iv. Allen Pride, b ca 1869 d Apr 27, 1870 of diptheria.[31] —v. Martella Pride, b Jun 6, 1871[32] d 1872, aged 10 months.[33]

56. William Henry Ripley [John3rd, Henry2nd, Robert1st], b ca 1834 d 1920. m Olivia Knowlton, b 1832.

Children of William and Olivia (Knowlton) Ripley:

+111.i. William Herbert Ripley, b ca 1858 d 1934.[34] m Emma Theresa Read, b 1858 d 1940.[35] —ii. George Wellington Ripley, b ca 1860[36] d 1933.[37] m Renna Jane Smith, b ca 1869 d 1907, daughter of Joshua and Louisa (Read) Smith. Renna and George resided in Fenwick, N.S. —iii. Ina L. Ripley, b ca 1861.[38] —iv. Ernest Knowlton Ripley, b ca 1862.[39] m Eva Matilda Smith, b ca 1872. —v. Mary C. Ripley, b ca 1863.[40] m Francis Smith, b ca 1863[41] son of William and Amelia Smith. —vi. Ella Ripley, b ca 1863.[42] d 1957. m Amos Mitchell, b 1853 d 1930.[43] Amos and Ella resided at Pubwash, N.S. —vii. Bessie Ripley, b ca 1865.[44] —viii. Nan Ripley, b ca 1867.[45] —ix. Martha J. Ripley, b ca 1869 d Jun 11, 1874.[46] —x. Charles L. Ripley, b ca 1874.[47] —xi. Lida Ripley, b ca 1875.[48]

57. Henry Ripley[Henry3rd, Henry2nd, Robert1st], b 1835 at Nappan, N.S. d 1899 in Elgin County, Ontario. m Mary Knowlton, b 1838 d 1918.

Children of Henry and Mary (Knowlton):

+112.i. Alice Minnie Ripley, b Aug 25, 1864 at Nappan, N.S. d Jul 20, 1943 at Dutton, Ontario. m Dec 30, 1899, William Henry Farr, b ca 1860. +113.ii. Harvey Enos Ripley, b Oct 1, 1866 at Nappan, N.S. d Mar 29, 1949 in Elgin County, Ontario. m Feb 22, 1900, Flora Elizabeth Campbell, b ca 1870. +114.iii. Grace Lavinia Ripley, b Apr 30, 1869 at Nappan, N.S. d Mar 6, 1951 in Kent County, Ontario. m Jan 5, 1899, John Bobier, b ca 1865. +115.iv. Inglis Watkins Ripley, b May 28, 1872 in Elgin County, Ontario d Jul 14, 1941 at West Lorne, Ontario. m Feb 22, 1899 at Alvinston, Ontario, Lillie Lavillia Eadie, b Aug 2, 1878. +116.v. Henry Fawcett Ripley, b May 13, 1873 d Jun 71953 at West Lorne, Ontario. m (1) Alice Wall, b ca 1875 d 1904. m (2) Lydia Hauser, b ca 1875. +117.vi. Amos Tupper Ripley, b Feb 24, 1876 in Elgin County, Ontario d Feb 18, 1943. m Laura Lidell, b ca 1880 at Iona Station, Ontario.

58. William Ripley [Henry3rd, Henry2nd, Robert1st], b 1837 at Nappan Station, N.S. d 1916. William was a painter by trade. m (1) Thomasin Amelia Lowther, b 1838 d Dec 12, 1876, daughter of Joseph Lowther and Ann Lowther. m (2) Jul 18, 1877,[49] Annie Harrison, b 1844, daughter of Robert and Hannah Harrison.

Children of William and Thomasin (Lowther):

—i. Annie Laura Ripley, b 1862. —ii. Walter Mathias Ripley, b 1865. m 1895, Adie Wigmore, b ca 1870. —iii. William Ripley, b 1867. —iv. Frederick Ripley, b 1869 d 1873. —v. Mary Ripley, b 1872. —vi. Joseph Henry Ripley, b Nov 4, 1876 d 1958.[50].

59. Amos Trueman Ripley [Henry3rd, Henry2nd, Robert1st], b Feb 24, 1842 at Nappan Station, N.S. d Sep 6, 1908 at Dresden, Ontario. m Apr 10, 1866, Selina Amelia Ripley, b Apr 22, 1845 at Nappan, N.S. d 1924.

Children of Amos and Selina (Ripley) Ripley:

—i. Flora M. Ripley, b ca 1888 d 1853. —ii. Howard Melvin Ripley, b ca 1890. —iii. Hilliard Carman Ripley, b ca 1892. —iv. ----. —v. ----. —vi. ----. —vii. ----. —viii. ----. —ix. ----.

60. Mary Ripley [Henry3rd, Henry2nd, Robert1st], b 1843 at Nappan Station, N.S. d May 2, 1866. m Robert Symes Lowther, b 1833 d Apr 25, 1877.

Children of Mary and Robert (surname Lowther):

—i. Clara Lowther, b 1861. m 1882, James W. Smith, b ca 1860.

61. Gilbert Pugsley Ripley [Henry3rd, Henry2nd, Robert1st], b 1848 at Nappan, N.S. d Feb 28, 1946 at Detroit, Michigan, USA. m Maria Amelia Shipley, b 1848 d 1937 at Thamesville, Ontario.

62. Sarah Jane Ripley [Robert Bean3rd, Henry2nd, Robert1st], b ca 1830 d Sep 5, 1865. m Nov 10, 1864,[51] Thompson Glendenning, b ca 1834, a farmer, son of George Glendenning.

Children of Sarah Jane and Thompson (Glendenning):

—i. ---- Glendenning, b Sep 5, 1865 d Sep 5, 1865. One of triplets. —ii. George F. Glendenning, b Sep 5, 1865 d Nov 24, 1889.[52]. +118.iii. Robert T. Glendenning, b Sep 5, 1865 d Sep 3, 1827 at Manchester, Mass. m Dec 14, 1892, Eliza L. Harris, b ca 1870.

63. Mary Fawcett Ripley [Robert Bean3rd, Henry2nd, Robert1st], b 1831 d 1870 at Spiritwood, North Dakota, USA. m William F. Harrison, b ca 1830.

Children of Mary and William (surname Harrison):

—i. Edward Harrison, b ca 1855 at Southampton, N.S. —ii. Rebecca Harrison, b ca 1857 at Southampton, N.S. —iii. Harvey Harrison, b ca 1859 at Southampton, N.S. —iv. Hattie Harrison, b ca 1861 at Southampton, N.S. —v. Mary Harrison, b ca 1863 at Southampton, N.S. —vi. Jennie Harrison, b ca 1865 at Southampton, N.S.

64. Lucy Ann Ripley [Robert Bean3rd, Henry2nd, Robert1st], b Jan 31, 1837. m Edward Wesley Shipley, b Sep 6, 1840 d Mar 15, 1914.

Children of Lucy and Edward (surname Shipley):

—i. Clara Jane Shipley, b Oct 19, 1863 at Nappan, N.S. d Jan 20, 1950. m (1) John William Moir, b ca 1860; m (2) Frank L. Ripley, b ca 1881 d Jan 11, 1961. —ii. Ripley Thompson Shipley, b Aug 8, 1865 d Sep 7, 1893. +119.iii. Charles Thomas Shipley, b Mar 9, 1867 d Mar 9, 1953. m Annie May Wood, b Mar 1, 1875 d 1973 at River Herbert, N.S. —iv. Laura Anna Shipley, b Sep 19, 1873 at Nappan, N.S. d Jul 11, 1943 at Lorneville, N.S. m Jul 14, 1903, Elmer Purdy Embree, b ca 1878 d Jan 16, 1971. —vii. Lillian May Shipley, b Jan 6, 1876 d Apr 11, 1911. m Dec 29, 1903, Charles Seymour Wood, b 1868 d Jan 21, 1961.

65. Rufus Ripley [Robert Bean3rd, Henry2nd, Robert1st], b 1840 at Nappan, N.S. d 1883 at Nappan. m Lois Lewis, b ca 1837 d 1908. Rufus was a medical doctor.

Children of Rufus and Lois (Lewis):

—i. Rufus Lewis Ripley, b ca 1864 at Nappan, N.S. d 1947. m Rosemund Pipes, b ca 1867 d 1949. —ii. Flossie Ripley, b ca 1871.

66. Robert William Ripley [Robert Bean3rd, Henry2nd, Robert1st], b 1842 d 1924. m Miriam Lewis, b ca 1845 d 1917. Robert settled at Maccan.

Children of Robert William Ripley and Miriam (Lewis):

+122.i. Robert Peel Ripley, b 1864 at Joggins, N.S. m Ruby Kinread, b ca 1867. +123.ii Jesse Sandford Ripley, b 1867 at Joggins, N.S. d 1939. m Susan Coleman, b 1870 d 1917. +124.iii. Ripley, b 1873 at Joggins, N.S. m (1) Nettie Burke, b ca 1873 at Minudie, N.S. m (2) Elizabeth Pugsley, b 1874 at Joggins, N.S. —vi. Mabel Ripley, b 1877 at Joggins, N.S. d Plymouth, Pa.. m Dimock L. Milburn, b 1878.

67. Thomas Ripley [Joseph3rd, Henry2nd, Robert1st], b ca 1836. m Matilda ----, b ca 1851. Thomas was farming in Brant County, Ontario in 1871.[53]

Children of Thomas and Matilda (----) Ripley:

—i. Clarence C. Ripley, b 1861.[54] m Emma J. ----, b ca 1872.[55] —ii. Walter Ripley, b 1863.[56] —iii. Lewis C. Ripley, b 1869.[57] —iv. Mary C. Ripley, b Sep 1870.[58] —v. Anna A. Ripley, b ca 1875.[59] —vi. Deward L. Ripley, ca Sep 1876.[60] —vii. Arthur R. Ripley, b 1881.[61]

68. Joseph [Joseph3rd, Henry2nd, Robert1st], b Jul 29, 1838 d 1887. m Dec 3, 1862 Sarah Morris, b Jan 24, 1841 in Nova Scotia. She was a daughter of Jacob and Mary (Ibbertson) Morris of St. Thomas, Virgin Islands. Joseph remained with his father until he was sixteen-and-a-half years of age, when he 'began to serve an apprenticeship in wagon-making'. In 1871 he became interested in farming and moved to Brant County, Ontario, where he remained for eight years. He then moved to Kent County, Ontario and settled in Harwich Township on a rented farm. In 1887 he bought one hundred acres in Camden Township, where he farmed until 1901. He then divided the land between his two eldest sons and moved to Dresden, Ontario.[62]

Children of Joseph and Sarah (Morris) Ripley:

—i. Laura S. Ripley, b 1864.[63] —ii. Bedford W. Ripley, b ca 1866.[64] m Ida ----, b ca 1867 in Ontario. —iii. Emma A. Ripley, b ca 1867.[65] —iv. Clara Ripley, b ca 1869.[66] —v. Charles Ripley, b 1871 in Nova Scotia.[67] —vi. Mary Stella Ripley, b ca 1874 in Ontario.[68] —vii. Seaman Ripley, b 1875.[69] —viii. Bertha Ripley, b 1879.[70] —ix. Lena Ripley, b 1876.[71]

69. Albert Esband Ripley [Joseph3rd, Henry2nd, Robert1st], b ca 1843. m (1) Cecilia ----, b ca 1847 d bfr 1881(?); m (2) Elizabeth Morris, b ca 1845.[72]

Children of Albert and Elizabeth (----) Ripley:

—i. Joseph E. Ripley, b Feb 26, 1864 d Jan 25, 1942 at St. Thomas, Ontario.[73] —ii. William H. Ripley, b Sep 1870.[74] —iii. Julia A. Ripley, b ca 1875.[75] —iv. Cecilia M. Ripley, b ca 1878.[76] —v. Russell U. Ripley, b ca 1879.[77] —vi. Albert P. Ripley, b ca 1881.[78]

70. Stephen Ripley [Joseph3rd, Henry2nd, Robert1st], b May 25, 1848 in Nova Scotia. m Lucy ----, b Feb 22, 1849 in Nova Scotia.[79] Living in Bothwell, Ontario in 1901.

Children of Stephen and Lucy (----) Ripley:

—i. Georgina Ripley, b Sep 14, 1873.[80] —ii. Adah Ripley, b Sep 8, 1875.[81] —iii. Noble Ripley, b May 3, 1879.[82] —iv. Ethel Ripley, b May 16, 1881.[83] —v. Agnes Ripley, b July 4, 1885.[84] —vi. Alberta Ripley, b Mar 11, 1888.[85]

71. George E. Ripley [Joseph3rd, Henry2nd, Robert1st], b ca 1851. m Margaret ----, b ca 1857. Living in Kent County, Ontario in 1881.[86]

Children of Thomas and Margaret (----) Ripley:

—i. Bruce Ripley, b ca 1879.[87]

72. Robert Herbert Ripley [William3rd, Robert2nd, Robert1st], b ca 1833. m Bridgit Brown, b ca 1840 d ca 1878. Robert was a carpenter.[88]

Children of Robert Herbert Ripley and Bridgit (Brown):

+126.i. William Clarence Ripley, b 1863 d 1929 at Athol, Nova Scotia.[89]. William was employed as a house joiner. Married Mary Ann O'Donnell, b ca 1865. —ii. Lorenzo Ripley, b 1866.[90]. In 1881 Lorenzo was employed as a factory hand, and was living independently with four other young factory workers. —iii. Clara Ripley, b 1868.[91] In 1881 Clara was employed as a servant by Edmund Davis, and was living with his family. —iv. Bridgit May Ripley, b 1870.[92] In 1881 May was living alone with her father Robert in Maccan, N.S.

73. John Brown Ripley [William3rd, Robert2nd, Robert1st], b ca 1837 d Aug 8, 1928 at Rodney, N.S. m (1) Dec 9, 1869, Caroline Boss, b ca 1842 d 1871 aged 29. m (2) Dec 21, 1875, Jane Ripley, b ca 1849 d 1933 at Springhill, N.S. Jane was a daughter of Thomas Ripley and Hannah Rushton.[93]

Children of John Brown Ripley and Caroline (Boss):

—i. Thomas Abner Ripley, b Jul 16, 1870.[94] —ii. Hedley Fenwick Ripley, b Nov 15, 1871.[95]

Children of John Brown Ripley and Jane (Ripley):

—i. Eva Jane Ripley, b Jan 9, 1867 at Athol, N.S. d 1952. m Noah Skidmore. —ii. Mary Ripley, b ca 1881.[96] +127.iii. William John Ripley, b Jan 15, 1882. Died in Salmon River, Colchester, N.S. m Cora Ethel Baird, b ca 1885.[97] —iv. Margaret Bella Ripley, b Jan 2, 1886.[98] —v. Hedley Brown Ripley, b Jan 1897. m Myrtle Hattie Johns in 1928. Hedley is listed in the 1901 Canada Census as 'adopted'.[99]

74. George W. Ripley [William3rd, Robert2nd, Robert1st], b ca 1840 d 1925 in Wentworth County, N.S. at age 85. m (1) Aug 9, 1865, Susan Amelia Rushton, b Jul 31, 1846 at Greenville, N.S. d 1889 age 42. m (2) Mary Esther Ripley, b 1842[100] d after 1911.[101]

+128.i. Charles Ripley, b 1888.[102] m Nellie ----, b ca 1892. Nellie and Charles were residing in Edmonton, Alberta in 1916.

76. Jane Ripley [Thomas3rd, Robert2nd, Robert1st], b ca 1849 d 1933. m John Brown Ripley on Dec 21, 1875.[103]

Children of Jane Ripley and John Brown Ripley:

—i. Eva Jane Ripley, b Jan 9, 1867 at Athol, N.S. d 1952. m Noah Skidmore. —ii. Mary Ripley, b ca 1881.[104] —iii. John William Ripley, b ca 1882.[105] —iv. Bella Ripley, b ca 1886.[106]

Children of William T. and Abigail (Pipes):

Burton Stanley Ripley, b Oct 21, 1882. m Georgina Maude Smith. —vii. William Rowland Ripley, b Nov 22, 1884. m Estella Johnson, b ca 1885. —viii. Morley Dalton Ripley, b Oct 12, 1889. m (1) Louise Corbett, b ca 1890. m (2) Francis -----.

78. Thomas Coates Ripley [Thomas3rd, William2nd, Robert1st], b 1835 d 1916. m Christianna Trueman, b ca 1835.

Children of Thomas C. and Christianna (Trueman):

—i. Esther J. Ripley, b ca 1859[108]. m James Hubert Ripley, b ca 1870, son of James and Dorothy (Smith) Ripley. —ii. Trueman Thomas Ripley, b Apr 13, 1863[109] d 1909. m Mary A. Davis, b Oct 18, 1865. Daughter of John Davis of Maccan, N.S. Trueman and Mary had no children. —iii.
